amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to transfer $13 million from federal prisoner detention to Youth PROMISE local delinquency prevention grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
